statements: UPDATE public_opinion_survey_results SET voter_response = 'Agree' WHERE survey_id = 'a4b7c6d5-e2f1-4a9b-87e6-73b0c2fa7d11';
UPDATE public_opinion_survey_results SET survey_question = 'How satisfied are you with the new policies?' WHERE survey_id = 'e3d8c7b6-a1f2-4b9c-8e7f-3b2a1f7d6c5e';
UPDATE public_opinion_survey_results SET survey_question = 'Do you support the new policy?' WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE public_opinion_survey_results SET voter_response = 'Strongly Disagree', survey_question = 'Do you support the new policy?' WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE SurveyResults SET survey_response = 'Agree' WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE VoterPreferences SET political_party = 'Green Party', preferred_candidate = 'Candidate X' WHERE voter_id = '78901234-5678-9012-3456-789012345678';
UPDATE SurveyResults SET survey_response = 'Neutral' WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE VoterPreferences SET age = 35, political_party = 'Independent' WHERE voter_id = 'c496f402-7b72-4996-94c2-2dfee49f0b8b';
UPDATE survey_responses SET response = 'Agree' WHERE response_id = 1;
UPDATE voters SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE voter_id = 101;
UPDATE survey_results SET survey_question='Q1: How satisfied are you with the product?', survey_answer='Very satisfied' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE survey_responses SET response='Positive feedback received from voter', timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE response_id=2;
UPDATE survey_results SET voter_id = 1001, question = 'Favorite Color', answer = 'Blue' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE survey_results SET answer = 'Yes', recorded_at = '2022-10-15 08:30:45' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE survey_results SET answer='Yes' WHERE voter_id=123 AND question='Q1'
UPDATE voters SET age=30, registration_status=true WHERE voter_id=456
UPDATE VoterDemographics SET age = 30, ethnicity = 'Hispanic' WHERE voter_id = 101
UPDATE SurveyResponses SET response = 'Agree' WHERE response_id = 201
UPDATE VoterDemographics SET age = 30, gender = 'Male', ethnicity = 'Caucasian' WHERE voter_id = 12345;
UPDATE SurveyQuestions SET question_text = 'What is your favorite color?', question_type = 'Multiple Choice' WHERE question_id = 67890;
